arts.ttl: Newcastle United vs Manchester City – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Newcastle United welcome Manchester City to St. James’ Park on Saturday evening, desperate to turn their season around. Eddie Howe’s side have lost their last two Premier League matches. Worryingly, they squandered leads in both defeats against West Ham and Brentford. arts.ttl: Manchester City XI vs Newcastle United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Manchester City travel to the North East on Saturday, looking to keep the pressure on league leaders Arsenal. Pep Guardiola’s side arrive in excellent form. In fact, they have won four straight games in all competitions. Most notably, they thrashed Liverpool 3-0 in their last outing before the international break.
